text: Can you help me book an appointment with Dr. Smith?
Sure, I can help you with that. To register the appointment, I need the name of the patient, doctor, and date of appointment. What is your name, the doctor's name, and the date you want to book?
My name is John, the doctor's name is Smith and I want to book the appointment on 2022-08-15.
Great! To confirm, you want to book an appointment with Dr. Smith on Monday. What time would you prefer?
The API call was successful. Your appointment ID is 11540956. Is there anything else I can help you with?
